winter_mode.description: Enables winter mode in Home assistant. Get your home ready for winter! ❄️
winter_mode.disable_confirmation: Winter mode will be disabled in Home assistant. You can re-enable this at any time in labs settings.
winter_mode.enable_confirmation: Winter mode will be enabled in Home assistant. You can turn this off at any time in labs settings.
winter_mode.name: Winter mode

set_theme.description: Sets the default theme Home Assistant uses. Can be overridden by a user.
set_theme.name: Set the default theme
